beta-test-text: Become a beta tester to receive an email with a game key when the beta is released. Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest news about the game.
steam-text: By whislisting Abrupt Valley, be among the first ones to play the game on the release date!
overview-city-text: Build the best city to defeat your enemy. Gather gold and resources to build and upgrade military buildings. Adapt to your territory and optimize building placements.
overview-army-text: Create your army from the military units of your city. Choose the best units adapt your army to your enemy's troops. Grow your army and upgrade your units to become stronger.
overview-ladder-text: Fight against opponents all around the world or train against an AI to learn the game. Become the best player and climb the ladder. Become the true king of the Abrupt Valley.
about-us-text: We are a small team of passionate developers who want to create the best strategy game. We are working hard to make this game the best it can be. We are open to any feedback and suggestions to improve the game
